name: SWITCHEROO (itch) (nICOLEdev)
description:
This  game was made for the Kenney game jam but it wasn't uploaded on time :(
But i didn't wanted it to go to waste, so i'm uploading it here.
A shoot 'em up type of game.

Controls: arrow keys or w a s d to move and spacebar to shoot.

Art assets belong to Kenney!
